### About me

I am a post-doctoral researcher at the University of California, Berkeley, and affiliated with the Center for Effective Global Action (CEGA).

I hold a Ph.D. in Economics from Tilburg University where I am also affiliated with the Experimental Economists at Tilburg. 

I am a member of the New York Academy of Sciences.

My CV is available [here]("files/JRUE CV August19.pdf")


### Primary interests                     

- Development Economics       
- Behavioural Economics


### Secondary interests

- Experimental Economics
- Social and Cognitive Psychology
